tossup_question: -   –   Which of the following vitamins is not fat soluble?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Tocopherol [toh-cof-uh-rol]
X) Phylloquinone [fy-loh-kwih-nohn]
Y) Pyridoxine [pie-rih-dox-een]
Z) Calciferol [cal-sihf-uh-rol]
bonus_question: -   –  In C4 photosynthesis, carbon dioxide is fixed to phosphoenolpyruvate [fos-foh-ee-nol-pie-roo-vate] instead of RuBisCo, which forms oxaloacetate. Oxaloacetate is then converted into what organic compound before it is transported to the bundle-sheath cells?
